strapiPost.title: Downtown Springdale Announces 2022 LIVE! At Turnbow Headliners
strapiPost.content:
The Downtown Springdale Alliance has announced its LIVE! at Turnbow headliners for their monthly downtown concert series.

  • Encore: LIVE! at Turnbow will be a season of free outdoor concerts on the last Thursday of every month April-October. The events happen at Walter Turnbow Park where the community can listen to local artists and bands, and enjoy a bite and drink in the Downtown Outdoor Dining District. 
  • Lineup: All concerts will begin at 6:30p. The headliners for this year are as follows: April - Modeling, May - Jeff Horton Band, June - TBA, July - Jukebox Confession, August - House of the Songs Presents, September - Big Piph, October - City Sessions artist. 

For more details about the event or lineups, click HERE.
